channel.title: LSE:STAN on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in LSE:STAN on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: StanChart CEO on Earnings, Volatility, Digital Assets
item.description: Standard Chartered Plc Chief Executive Officer Bill Winters discusses the bank’s performance in the second quarter as adjusted pretax profit came in at $2.4 billion for the three months through June 3
